name: typescript-starter
description: A basic seed project to run typescript

scripts.preinstall: npm install -g typescript mocha tsd@next karma-cli supervisor
scripts.ts: find src/*.ts test/*.ts -type f -exec tsc --target ES5 --sourceMap --module commonjs '{}' \;
scripts.watch: supervisor -w src/,test/ -n exit -e ts -x npm test
